named-query.name: Participant.findByDNI
named-query.query: select c from Participant c where c.dni = ?1

named-query.name: Participant.findLogableUser
named-query.query: select s from Participant s where s.usuario = ?1 and s.password = ?2

named-query.name: Suggestion.findByPId
named-query.query: select s from Suggestion s where s.participant = ?1

named-query.name: Suggestion.findById
named-query.query: select s from Suggestion s where s.id = ?1

named-query.name: Comment.findBySugId
named-query.query: select c from Comment c where c.suggestion.id = ?1

named-query.name: Comment.findById
named-query.query: select c from Comment c where c.id = ?1
